description.displayText:
Fotini cared for our son from the newborn to toddler age.   She also would take care of our daughter and our dog if we were in need of help.  I cannot say enough positive things about Fotini.  She is a true role model and somebody that I will forever admire for her abundance of patience, joy of learning, discipline, and a desire to help those in need.  
I work 12 hour night shifts and my husband's work hours were unpredictable - so we really needed a reliable adult who would teach, play, stick with schedules, etc.  
When Fotini was with my kiddos, i knew that I did not have to worry.  And, although I tried to keep the house tidy, it was always a thousand times cleaner when I came home then when I left.  I trust her with anything and caring for anybody.  She is an open and honest communicator as far as expectations,  scheduling, or anything that might come up.

description.displayText: Tina is punctual, professional and most importantly kind and wonderful to my children!  My three year old jumps for joy when I tell her Tina is coming over...we love having her in our home.

description.displayText: I have had a wonderful experience with Mrs. F.  She provides excellent care.
